original: intros. destruct (list_bool_choose lb) as [[k1 [tl1 H1]] | [k1 H1]]; destruct (list_pick nat lb k) as [ln [lc [H2 H3]]]. - left. exists ln. exists lc. split. + rewrite H2. rewrite H1. reflexivity. + apply H3. - right. exists ln. exists k1. split. + rewrite H2. rewrite H1. reflexivity. + apply H3.
